payload.content: To realize meaningful returns on AI investments, leadership must take accountability and ownership of establishing best practices, enabling engineers, measuring impact, and ensuring proper guardrails are in place.

name: To realize meaningful returns on AI investments, leadership must take accountabi
content: To realize meaningful returns on AI investments, leadership must take accountability and ownership of establishing best practices, enabling engineers, measuring impact, and ensuring proper guardrails are in place.

payload.content: When prompting practice and reflexive AI use is driven from the top down, engineers can align on the highest value use cases and experience peak productivity gains.

name: When prompting practice and reflexive AI use is driven from the top down, engine
content: When prompting practice and reflexive AI use is driven from the top down, engineers can align on the highest value use cases and experience peak productivity gains.

payload.content: Leaders can gain a clear picture of AI's true impact, identify real bottlenecks in the SDLC that can be augmented with AI, and drive improvement by utilizing DX's AI Measurement Framework.

name: Leaders can gain a clear picture of AI's true impact, identify real bottlenecks
content: Leaders can gain a clear picture of AI's true impact, identify real bottlenecks in the SDLC that can be augmented with AI, and drive improvement by utilizing DX's AI Measurement Framework.
